text: The Cairo Ohio River Bridge is a cantilever bridge over the Ohio River. U.S. Route 51, U.S. Route 60, and U.S. Route 62 go on the bridge. The bridge is between Wickliffe, Kentucky and Cairo, Illinois. The Mississippi River can be seen while crossing the bridge. ==References== Category:Bridges in the United States Category:Cantilever bridges
title: Cairo Ohio River Bridge
